name: Smallest Federated Wiki
description: A wiki that shares through federation, composes by refactoring and wraps data with visualization.

wiki_url.description: The domain you will use for this site (if you don't have any domain, use the same "App Name" you've chosen up there and add .herokuapp.com. For example: if you chosed "bananas-wiki" as your app name, this should be "bananas-wiki.herokuapp.com")
